name: eval2-studi-dynamiser-sites-javascript-23-01-2023
description: ## Évaluation Studi n°2 - "Dynamiser vos sites web avec Javascript" - Dice game

scripts.build: postcss ./src/css/input.css -o ./dist/css/output.css && cp -R ./src/images/ ./dist/images/ && mkdir ./dist/js/ && cp ./src/js/*.js ./dist/js && cp ./src/*.html ./dist/ && rm ./dist/js/*.test.js

author: Clément Floret
